Comments_List: Exposure to research happening across the country by a varied group of speakers on a wide range of topics in environmental economics.
Good exposure to research outside of Yale.
Course was well organized. No weaknesses.
Outside speaker selection is good. could be improved by asking students what type of work they would like to see presented, which the facilitators have started to do.
A great seminar to take no matter where in your environmental economics training you are.
Take if interested in doctorate level environmental economics.
